Package com.asp.smartbeergreenhouse.thingsboard

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ThingsboardService
    ThingsboardService interface Defines the calls to the Thingsboard REST API GET operations: - Call getAssetServerAttributes (@Header("X-Authorization") String token,@Path("assetID") String id); - Call getInfoFromAsset (@Header("X-Authorization") String token, @Query("assetName") String name) - Call getInfoFromDevice (@Header("X-Authorization") String token, @Query("deviceName") String name); - Call getAlarmsFromDevice (@Header("X-Authorization") String token, @Path("deviceId") String deviceId, @Query("pageSize") String pageSize, @Query("page") String pageNumber); - Call getAlarmsFromAsset (@Header("X-Authorization") String token, @Path("assetId") String assetId, @Query("pageSize") String pageSize, @Query("page") String pageNumber) POST operations: - Call getToken (@Body JsonObject credentials)
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    OperationsAPI
    OperationsAPI class It provides the methods to interact with REST API using methods defined in ThingsboardService interface It is used to get Thingsboard token and retrieved information from Thingsboard
    ThingsboardApiAdapter
    ThingsboardApiAdapter Class that uses singleton pattern, to have an only instance for the API Service
